## ScrapersAPI.postScrapersIDLabels() method

Add a label to a scraper target. See [https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/\#operation/PostScrapersIDLabels](https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/#operation/PostScrapersIDLabels)

<b>Signature:</b>

